description: This table contains reviewer information for the Plan of Care (POC) master file.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: POC_RVWR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifiers for providers associated with the plan of care as reviewers.
